roleset.name: Flow in the opposite direction
roleset.note: Based on twitter disaster data. Comparison to flow, except anticipating volition. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie.

example.name: There will likely be a desitnation, direction, or goal. Mark these as arg-Ms.
example.text: hopefully you guys be contraflowing to dry ground

example.name: arg 0 with volition
example.text: [we-1] decided [*-1] ta contraflow away from da hurricane path
